MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 postcode area of Cotebrook, affecting properties in Stable Lane, Fishpool Road and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of third party damage to an underground cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by generator by 12:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:33PM on 15th March 2021.
